description.narrative: This activity (Supporting Government Reform in Zambia) is a component of National School of Government International (NSGI) support to country programmes in sustainable centre of government reforms. reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £261,745. This component benefits Zambia, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 17-05-2018 and the end date is 31-05-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
